---
title: "Daten "
format: html
---
<div class="iframe-wrap">
  <iframe id="data-iframe"
          src="assets/build/data.html?v=5"
          loading="lazy"
          style="width:100%;border:0;display:block;min-height:60vh;">
  </iframe>
</div>
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message', (e) => {
    if (e.data && e.data.type === 'TTN_IFRAME_SIZE') {
      const ifr = document.getElementById('data-iframe');
      if (ifr) ifr.style.height = Math.max(600, e.data.height) + 'px';
    }
  });
</script>

<script>
(function () {
  const ifr = document.getElementById('data-iframe');
  window.addEventListener('message', function (ev) {
    if (!ev.data || ev.data.type !== 'TTN_IFRAME_SIZE') return;
    const h = parseInt(ev.data.height, 10);
    if (!isNaN(h) && h > 0) ifr.style.height = (h + 20) + 'px';
  }, false);
})();
</script>
